document_data.name: ''Ring of ESP''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''ring of ESP''''' was a [[magic item]] that allowed the wearer to hear the surface thoughts of others around them.
document_data.Powers: When worn, a ''ring of ESP'' allowed the wearer to eavesdrop on the surface thoughts of people near them. Thoughts could be read for several minutes but only worked on a single target at a time.
document_data.Notable Owners: [[Brace Ulmemur]], a member of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[City Watch (Waterdeep)|City Watch]], wore a ''ring of ESP''.
